Package edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util

Classes that provide basic functionality useful to classes in many different packages.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AllenAtlasMeshLoader A pure java implementation of a mesh reader that can read the format that the Allen Brain Institute has encoded meshes that are derived from an atlas of the mouse brain.
BitMath Performs low level bit math operations to read some binary formats.
CatmullRomCurve CatmullRomCurve
ColorUtil Utility class to convert java Color classes to jME ColorRGBA.
CurveOnceController  
FengJMEInputHandler FengJMEInputHandler
FocusManager  
Log Supports logging for the system.
MemPool This is a class that contains temporary objects usable in functions during jME's execution.
NormalGenerator A utility class to generate normals for a set of vertices.
OMTDiscreteLodNode Provides a node that has convenience methods for setting the distance switch model at the same time that a child is being added.
X3DLoader A Loader class to load models from XML-encoded X3D files (see this link for the specification) into jME.

This Loader is designed to be able to load the geometry and lights contained in an X3D file and set the necessary properties to correctly set up a model for jME.
XSLTransformManager Manages XSL transforms.
 

Exception Summary
OMTException Base class for all application-level exceptions
 

Package edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util Description

Classes that provide basic functionality useful to classes in many different packages.
